item.title: Ready for Saturday 12
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Ready for Saturday 12

Sanctuary4All Colorado is with Jeanette Vizguerra in Denver, Colorado.

Jeanette Vizguerra is selling tamales for pickup in Denver & Boulder on December 12. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

item.title: My Rosie is starting her little own little shop (Rosie's...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

My Rosie is starting her little own little shop (Rosie's creations) she is making homemade honey based soap. She will soon have her Etsy account ready to go which will have her soap and hand made drawings on her page. If you would like to try some out let me know she makes any scent of your choice. Somebody needs contact #720 329 06 57 Jeanette Vizguerra
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Good news Yes! District Judge Nicholas Garaufis just ruled for...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Good news Yes! District Judge Nicholas Garaufis just ruled for the full restoration of #DACA that opens the program for new applicants for the first time since 2017. This is a step forward in the fight for freedom but our communities need permanent protections that ensure the safety and security of ALL community members. #FreedomTogether https://cbsn.ws/3qxdUuO

One million undocumented immigrant teens and young adults who qualify for DACA on paper could apply for the Obama-era protections from deportation following the court order.

cbsnews.com

Judge orders restoration of DACA, opening immigration program to new applicants for first time since 2017

One million undocumented immigrant teens and young adults who qualify for DACA on paper could apply for the Obama-era protections from deportation following the court order.One million undocumented immigrant teens and young adults who qualify for DACA on paper could apply for the Obama-era protections from deportation following the court order.
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoThe ACLU's Lee Gelernt said he's often asked whether the Trump administration has helped reunite families. He said...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoThe ACLU's Lee Gelernt said he's often asked whether the Trump administration has helped reunite families. He said that rather than help, it has withheld data.

nbcnews.com

Trump administration has handed over new data to help reunite migrant families

The ACLU's Lee Gelernt said he's often asked whether the Trump administration has helped reunite families. He said that rather than help, it has withheld data.The ACLU's Lee Gelernt said he's often asked whether the Trump administration has helped reunite families. He said that rather than help, it has withheld data.
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Happy #GivingTuesday! Sanctuary4All is an immigrant-led group...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Happy #GivingTuesday! Sanctuary4All is an immigrant-led group dedicated to protecting families and improving the lives of Colorado immigrants of all backgrounds. Founded in 2019 by longtime immigration activist Jeanette Vizguerra, Sanctuary4All works at the intersection of mutual aid and political action. By connecting directly impacted families with caring members of our community we will lift each other up and build a movement to affect positive systemic change for the masses. You can support our mission by purchasing pupusas from Yessenia at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co committing to a monthly donation via Patreon at Patreon.com/Sanctuary4All or donating to sanctuary-4-all on Venmo. ðŸ’•âœ¨

Become a patron of Sanctuary4All today: Get access to exclusive content and experiences on the worldâ€™s largest membership platform for artists and creators.

patreon.com

Sanctuary4All is creating support for people directly impacted by deportation | Patreon

item.title: Did you know that in Denver, no more than TWO unrelated people...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Did you know that in Denver, no more than TWO unrelated people can live in the same household? That means you can't have more than one roommate to help pay your mortgage. Times are already tough, let's make it easier to live in Denver, not harder.

Join us in supporting Denver's proposed group living ordinance that will allow:
- up to FIVE unrelated people to live in the same household if you so choose.
- allow residential care facilities in more places ...
- the creation of congregate living spaces that could be used for teacher housing and more!

Sign up for this community meeting on Thursday from 5:30-7:30pm by clicking this link: https://denvergov-org.zoom.us/â€¦/râ€¦/WN_fZlzw6rKQfCuabG8H_yEGw

Not able to attend but want to support anyway? Sign our letter of support here: https://forms.gle/GCpEuFFxbkYbXtoE6

Los tiempos ya son lo suficientemente difÃ­ciles, hagamos mÃ¡s fÃ¡cil vivir en Denver, no mÃ¡s difÃ­cil.

AcompÃ¡Ã±enos en apoyar la ordenanza de vida grupal propuesta por Denver que permitirÃ¡:
- hasta CINCO personas no relacionadas para vivir en el mismo hogar si asÃ­ lo desean
- instalaciones de cuidado residencial en mÃ¡s lugares
- la creaciÃ³n de espacios de vida congregados que podrÃ­an ser utilizados para la vivienda de los maestros y mÃ¡s!
